Reviews.Tests Package
=====================

The `reviews.tests` package includes all test modules related to the `reviews` package. These modules handle testing for functionality, memory usage, and performance of the review-related operations in the platform.

Submodules
----------

The `reviews.tests` package provides the following submodules:

reviews.tests.profile\_reviews module
-------------------------------------

The `profile_reviews` module is responsible for profiling the performance of the review-related tests.

------------------------------

The `test_app` module contains the primary test cases for all review-related functionalities, including adding, updating, flagging, and approving reviews.
